name: The horrors of the Soviet apartment
name_original: The horrors of the Soviet apartment
description:
"The Horrors of the Soviet apartment" is a short horror game from the first person. The location in the game is an abandoned, musty Soviet apartment, which conveys a terrible atmosphere.

You have to pick up all the valuables in a short period of time and quickly leave so as not to run into him.... face to face.. Who is it?

Walking as a character - W.A.S.D

Interaction - E/LMB

Sit down - SHIFT

Languages - English, Russian

I made this game in one evening.
